mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, B.* FROM ( SELECT A.APP_SEQ, A.APP_WRITER_NO, A.APP_WRITE_SYS, A.FIRST_TIME_APPROVER, A.INTERIM_APPROVER, A.FINAL_APPROVER, A.APP_CHECK_SYSDATE, A.APP_CHECK_PROGRESS, A.APP_REASON, A.APP_ORIFILENAME, A.APP_REFILENAME, M.USER_NAME, M.RANK, A.APPROVAL_KINDS, D.DEPT_NAME FROM APPROVAL A JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.APP_WRITER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (D.DEPT_CODE = M.DEPT_CODE) WHERE ((#{user_name} = A.FIRST_TIME_APPROVER) OR (#{user_name} = A.INTERIM_APPROVER) OR (#{user_name} = A.FINAL_APPROVER)) ORDER BY A.APP_SEQ DESC) B ORDER BY ROWNUM
